elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Introduce the essence of the discount principle by commenting on the reason for each of the following measures.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Simple store fittings
elements.correctAnswer: Savings are made on furniture and furnishings, which helps to keep sales prices low.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Self-service
elements.correctAnswer: Self-service saves on personnel costs; this saving helps to reduce prices even further.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Favorable locations
elements.correctAnswer: Convenient locations are not always easy to reach, but the savings are deducted from the price.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Minimal services
elements.correctAnswer: The company does not pamper its customers and saves costs, thus reducing prices even further.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Mass products
elements.correctAnswer: The company mainly offers mass-produced products and bestsellers and does without a large selection, thereby lowering prices once again.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Why can a discount store offer low prices? Tick the correct answer.
choices: No imported items, thus saving on customs costs
